infotexts.afflictionname.Slow_Baka: Baka!(Heal by using Spirit Energy Stabilizer)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Slow_Baka: ⑨！（Heal by using Spirit Energy Stabilizer）
infotexts.afflictionname.Reiki_Side_Effect: Spirit Energy Disorder（Heal by using Spirit Energy Stabilizer）
infotexts.afflictionname.Reiki_Side_Effect_NT: Spirit Energy Disorder（Heal by using Spirit Energy Stabilizer）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Side_Effect_: The Repulsion cause by the active defense of your body,which makes the Spirit Energy inside your body bacome disordered(Heal by using Spirit Energy Stabilizer)
It's getting worse now，you had a feeling of pain inside your body（Heal by using Spirit Energy Stabilizer）
infotexts.afflictionname.Reiki_Pressure: Reiki Pressure（Can be healed by any meds that can treat physical damage）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Pressure: Unfriendly Spirit Energy in your body is doing a lot of damage,Can be healed by any meds that can treat physical damage.like：Morphine，Fentanyl，Divine Remedy，Herbal Essence，Europa Tincture，Gilead Balm etc.）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Essential_Oil_Appl: The wound of your hurt has been eased,but the pain is still there.
Cover the surface of the wound with this special essential oil in order to help recovering.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Potion_In_Effect: This makes you full of faith（cause of reduce resistance）
infotexts.afflictionname.Phoenix_Burn: Burn of The Phoenix（can be treated by Herbal Essence，Europa Tincture,or just wait until it disappear）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Phoenix_Burn: A scar left by a special type of flame，always gives you a feeling that it's not deadly（can be treated by Herbal Essence，Europa Tincture,or just wait until it disappear）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aura_Strip: You feel your body status has become worse after a part of your Aura has been Striped.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Resurrection: It’s just an ordinary day with nothing special.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lost_Dream: You find that the dreams of the past are gradually fading away, and you can no longer remember them. Your physical condition is also deteriorating.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_De: There is something inside you that are flowing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_Bu: There is some kind of healing energy inside you that are flowing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Budesonide_: The airway inflammation is subsiding, and the symptoms of asthma are being alleviated.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_MEID_Effect: The abiity of your body has been increased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Royal_Flare: There is a flow with astonishing heat inside you,you body is about to be torn apart
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Silent_Sele: You can't move freely as if your body is frozen.
infotexts.afflictionname.Magic_Destruction: Magic Destruction（can't be treated in normal ways）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Magic_Destruction: The magic inside you is almost been destoryed totally,you can't move freely before being healed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rib_Injury: It seems that a part of your rib is missed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Reiki_Stabi: The severe pain inside you has been eased.
The severe pain inside you has been eased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Magic_Boost: The magic inside you become more active,can be coordinated as your wish.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sleepless_Nightmar: The nightmare that doesn't belong to this world broke your mind,causing the decrease of your body resistance.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ancient_Sorrow_Ter: The negative feelings come from inside yourself make your mind unstable.
infotexts.afflictionname.Expellees_Canaan_Small: Mountain hollow「The Promised Land of the Exiles」
infotexts.afflictionname.Expellees_Canaan_Huge: Mountain hollow「The Promised Land of the Exiles」
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Expellees_Canaan: The trick to drive away the invaders。Makes small yourself looks bigger。\nYou're truly amazing, Tsukihime! Please keep guarding us in the future as well.
infotexts.afflictionname.Touhou_Bite: Bite（can be treated by the meds that heal physical damage）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bite: Though there are no visible wounds on the surface, the pain in the affected area just won't go away.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rippling_Ef: This weird wave makes your body hard to control and dizzy mind.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Scarlet_Long_Night: Sometimes words came out unconciously can change the fate of others.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Aya_Camera_: Just like the at-a-loss feeling when you're facing a camera
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Destruction_Of_Mu: The most important part of anything is callled "Mu".To distory something,just apply the force on it,you can break it easily.
infotexts.afflictionname.Touhou_Freeze: Freeze（can be treated just as same as treating burns）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Freeze_Low: The frostbitten area is a bit painful, but it's not too serious.（can be treated just as same as treating burns）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Freeze_High: The affected area is severely frostbitten and will not heal on its own. Immediate treatment is necessary.（can be treated just as same as treating burns）
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nitori_Backpack_Ta: Slightly increase bleed resistance, slightly reduce the duration of debuffs, slightly extend the duration of buffs, reduce friendly fire damage, and reduce spread.
Slightly increase resistance to stun and reki disorder, heal infected wounds and reki disorder, reduce friendly fire damage, increase movement speed, and enhance skill levels.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lunatic_Lun: A surge of madness wells up from within your mind, and your hostility towards your crew increases.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Pendulum_Ma: Pendulum Magic makes your magic skill stronger.Increase 5% bleeding resistance after your magic skill is above 120.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Tide_Bolt_E: The mysterious ocean on the far side of the moon rises and falls within you, disrupting your body's defenses.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Alice_Magic: The flame from the Magic Kingdom not only shatters your body's defenses but also scorches every inch of your skin.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Gensokyo_Divinggea: Increase physical resistance and skill levels.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Boudary_Divinggear: Increase physical resistance and skill levels.
infotexts.afflictionname.Touhou_Lunar_Orbit_Effect: Lunar Cyclone (treated with medication for physical damage)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lunar_Orbit: The chaotic lunar cyclone has damaged the epidermis, and if not treated promptly, there is a risk of further escalation.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Mana_Release_Effec: Continuously release magical power from within the body to resist water pressure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Luna_Clock_: The forced manipulation of time has placed a significant strain on your body, reducing your physical resistance.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Miracles_Wi: The magical power from the Wind Oracle protects you and slowly heals your wounds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.SanaeTalent_Effect: Increase skill acquisition speed by 50%, and boost skill levels by 10%.
Repair speed and hull repair speed are increased by 50%, and stun resistance is increased by 15%.
Ranged attack damage is increased by 5%, and melee attack damage is increased by 15%.
Increase maximum health by 10%, and boost physical damage resistance of the legs by 20%.
Increase swimming speed by 40%, and boost burn resistance by 10%.
Gain 7 random skill points, and increase experience acquisition speed by 15%.
Increase movement speed by 15%, attack speed by 10%, and reduce friendly fire damage by 50%.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Treatment_G: A wave of healing energy is miraculously treating your wounds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Sparkfire_S: Flame-attached projectiles are sticking to you and burning intensely.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Deceit_Mod_: Your melee and ranged attacks (with a certain probability) will now mark targets.
You have been marked by a dangerous target.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Maple_Leaf_: The performance of the Maple Leaf Revolver is significantly enhanced.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Dichromatic: Increase physical resistance, resist and recover from negative states.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Durationinc: Further extend the duration of beneficial effects and reduce the duration of detrimental effects.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Huskinfecti: Additional increase in burn resistance and improved movement speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Paralysisre: Boost skill levels and increase experience acquisition speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_ODM6_Poison: The potent toxins of the unclean magic severely degrade your physical capabilities, and the viscous air significantly reduces your mobility. Ranged weapon-related damage -75%, movement speed +25%, melee damage +60%, physical resistance decreases. Until the toxin activates, health is fixed at an increase of 25 points. If the toxin spreads throughout the body, there will be very troublesome consequences.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Cuisine_Eff: Warmth makes you feel comfortable all over, and your spirit is better than ever. No more nightmares. Immune to the nightmare of eternal sleep and cures mental illness.
Feeling comfortable all over. Increases debuff resistance and duration of beneficial effects.
The wonderful taste melts on your tongue, and you feel more lively. Increase skill level and maximum health.
The taste of the delicious food lingers on your taste buds for a long time, and you feel healthier than ever. Increase movement speed and attack damage.
Your spirit and body have reached their peak. Gain extra health, allowing full-speed dragging of creatures.
The top-grade diet brings the ultimate enjoyment. Extend the duration of beneficial effects, increase melee damage and melee attack speed.
The top-grade diet brings the ultimate enjoyment. Extend the duration of beneficial effects, increase repair speed, hull repair speed, skill acquisition speed, and underwater propulsion speed.
The top-grade diet brings the ultimate enjoyment. Extend the duration of beneficial effects, increase swimming speed, water current resistance, and immunity to hypoxia and water pressure.
The top-grade diet brings the ultimate enjoyment. Immune to operation reversal (dizziness), increase skill level and attack damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Drinks_Effe: A refreshing sip. You gain mental resistance faster.
Top-notch wine! The duration of beneficial effects is longer.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Drugs_Effec: Can't wait for another glass! Your dizziness resistance is improved.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Drinks_Effe: A taste to remember! Immune to operation reversal (dizziness), increase melee attack damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rose_Fragra: The sweet scent makes you feel happy and enhances your physical abilities.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Sentient_Gr: More likely to become the target of enemy attacks
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_ODM8_Aff_Ev: An unbearable stabbing pain attacks your heart, causing a significant drop in vitality, but also stimulating the body's potential. Max Health -50%, slightly reduce the effectiveness of drug use and treatment, but significantly increase attack damage, increase movement speed and skill level.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Reiki_Pressur: You died from excessive reiki pressure, causing your body to collapse.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Phoenix_Burn: You died from the continuous burning of the Phoenix, turning to ashes.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Touhou_Bite: You died from severe biting, consumed completely.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Destruction_O: You died from the complete destruction of your Mu, dying from the root.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Reiki_Side_Ef: You died from the pollution and erosion of your reiki, collapsing from the inside out.
Your reiki within has been polluted and eroded, collapsing from the inside out.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Touhou_Freeze: Your breathing has completely stopped, frozen into a statue.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Hyouibana_Effect_P: Attack damage increased by 10%.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and Aya's memento still takes effect.
Melee damage increased by 30%.
Has the exclusive weapon and equipment effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and the additional effects of MEID and Magic Shawl still take effect.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and the effects provided by Heavenly Peach still take effect.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and Aya's memento still takes effect.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and maximum health increased by 10%.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and maximum health increased by 10%.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and melee damage increased by 5%.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and debuff resistance increased by 10%.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and maximum health increased by 10%.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character, and dizziness resistance increased by 10%.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Has the exclusive weapon effects of the corresponding character.
Attack damage increased by 10%.
